document_data.name: Fender Stouthammer
document_data.author: R.A. Salvatore
document_data.title: The Hunter's Blades Trilogy Collectors Edition
document_data.mainbody: He is later healed by a Cleric of Lolth, [[Kaer'lic Suun Wett]]. Tos'un and Kaer'lic present him to [[Obould Many-Arrows]] as a gift.<ref>Ibid. p. 1015-6 He returns home in the company of [[Drizzt Do'Urden]].<ref>Ibid. p. 1038
